user_query: I am planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I want to gather some interesting facts about their favorite Bible verse. Can you fetch the verse text and provide me with a summary of its content? Additionally, I would like to know if their phone number is registered on WhatsApp.

TaskList.description: Fetch the text of the favorite Bible verse.
Provide a summary of the content of the fetched Bible verse.
Check whether the specified phone number is registered on WhatsApp.
